oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Remote Code Execution in GitHub Enterprise Management Console (March 31, 2016)
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: An issue was identified that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the GitHub Enterprise appliance. This vulnerability exists in the Management Console which is accessible from port 8080 and 8443. This is only applicable to GitHub Enterprise 2.5.0, 2.5.1, 2.5.2, and 2.5.3.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check if the version of GitHub Enterprise is greater than or equal 2.5.0 and less than 2.5.4
